answers.author: Mary Miller
answers.text:
MARC provides salary data for City Managers in the KC metro area.  For cities your size (up to 5000), the monthly pay ranges from $6886 to $9,250.

author: Joette Dedden
text: I'm looking for the salary rate for the position of City Manager.  Our village has a population of 3,200, so that would be the profile I would be looking for.  Thank you.
title: City Manager salaries
